Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute near Desplaines/Fulton
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses temp. rerouted NB: Jefferson, Fulton, Halsted & Milwaukee; SB: Milwaukee, Kinzie, Clinton, Fulton & Desplaines.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Desplaines/Fulton, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Jefferson, Fulton, Halsted & Milwaukee.

Southbound buses will operate via Milwaukee, Kinzie, Clinton, Fulton & Desplaines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity in the area of Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity in the area of Jackson.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
